headline: Tracking William Nygren's Harris Associates Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
summary: Harris Associates' 13F portfolio decreased to $75.99B, focusing on 49 significant securities. Check out the notable new stakes in the portfolio.

headline: 4 S&P 500 Stocks Down 20% or More That You'll Regret Not Buying
summary: Many investors frantically read the news last week: The S&P 500 officially entered correction territory, which is a drop of at least 10%.  The market correction may be short-lived, but it turns out that there are plenty of high-quality S&P 500 stocks that are down 20% or more.  Included among the underperformers are Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG)(NASDAQ: GOOGL), Vistra (NYSE: VST), Dollar General (NYSE: DG), and Airbnb (NASDAQ: ABNB).
